name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Biến Phương Thảo thành kì nhông

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replacing PTheo name aliases into lizard emoji

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One way or another, you accidentally know Phuong Thao and you may even be close to her. Mine happens to be pretty and pretty awesomely annoying. This is my attempt to wholesomely get back at her by making her into a salamander on websites where her name appears. #JustForFun.
